speaker: President.
english: President. – The next item is the report by Mr Sajjad Karim, on behalf of the Committee on International Trade, on the EU's economic and trade relations with India [ 2006/2034(INI) ], ( A6-0256/2006 ).
original: President. – The next item is the report by Mr Sajjad Karim, on behalf of the Committee on International Trade, on the EU's economic and trade relations with India [ 2006/2034(INI) ], ( A6-0256/2006 ).
agenda_item: The EU's economic and trade relations with India (debate)
